biotools.summary: Process and predict mapping of species abundance data. The package automates and greatly simplifies Boosted Regression Tree spatial modelling and makes this powerful statistical modelling technique more accessible to potential users in the ecological and modelling communities.

bioschemas.name: gbm.auto
bioschemas.summary: Process and predict mapping of species abundance data. The package automates and greatly simplifies Boosted Regression Tree spatial modelling and makes this powerful statistical modelling technique more accessible to potential users in the ecological and modelling communities.
